body.p: 1. Levite who sang praise to God after Ezra’s public reading of the law (Neh 9:4).
2. Political leader who signed Ezra’s covenant of faithfulness to God with Nehemiah and others after the exile (Neh 10:15).
3. Hashabiah’s father (Neh 11:15), a Levite descended from Merari (1 Chr 9:14). Possibly the same as #1 above.
